Back to Works by composer

Franz Liszt

1811–1886

Works overview · Works by difficulty · Recommended editions

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Works are identified by the numbering of Humphrey Searle, as revised by Sharon Winklhofer, Michael Short and Leslie Howard. See also works ordered by the Searle numbering, works ordered by the New Grove 2 numbering, works ordered by the Raabe numbering, and a list of works based on music by other composers.
